Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Canal
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark and Roosevelt due to street blockage near near Roosevelt/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark and Roosevelt due to street blockage near near Roosevelt/Canal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
